蹭.definition: to rub against; to walk slowly; (coll.) to freeload

蹭熱度.definition: (coll.) (often derog.) to piggyback on (sb's) popularity; to exploit (sb's) popularity to attract attention to oneself

蹭網.definition: (coll.) to use sb else's Internet connection (with or without permission)

蹭課.definition: (coll.) to sit in on a class

蹭蹬.definition: (literary) to encounter setbacks; to have bad luck

蹭車.definition: (coll.) to ride in sb else's car to save money; to ride on a train or bus without buying a ticket (fare-dodging)
